docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 9--The United Nations General Assembly which has been building machinery to prepare it to act against aggression, received a new recommendation today designed to pin war responsibility quickly on the country guilty of starting hostilities.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 15--The United Nations Korean Commission, en route to the Far East, will be prepared to observe Chinese Communist intervention in Korea, but will not attempt direct talks with Peiping representatives, Manuel Trucco, Chilcan member...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 15--The United Nations Korean Commission, en route to the Far East, will be prepared to observe Chinese Communist intervention in Korea, but will not attempt direct talks with Peiping representatives, Manuel Trucco, Chilcan member of the commission, said today.
